resources.string: Add the text here and use #$insertX$# for each of the four gaps then insert in the respective insertion the information missing from the text then press next. X should be 1,2,3 or 4 the gap info will be in the order set here
Add the text here and use #$insertX$# for each of the four gaps the text between #$..$# will be the information missing from the text
Select either of the options below
Write a question then press true or false then press finish
